BreadcrumbHomeNPDES Permits Around the NationNew Jersey NPDES PermitsIn New Jersey, EPA has delegated authority to issue NPDES permits to the New Jersey Dept. of Environmental Protection.For state-issued permits, visitNew Jersey Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NJPDES) ProgramRelated InformationAbout Region 2's NPDES Permit ProgramContact Us About NPDES Permits Around the Nationto ask a question, provide feedback, or report a problem.Last updated on November 12, 2024
